field.name: image_ref
field.description: A reference to the image asset to use for widgets, sharing, seo.

field.name: poster_image_ref
field.description: A reference to the image asset to use as the poster.

field.name: duration
field.description: Duration of the video in seconds.

field.name: description
field.description: A description of the video (usually a few sentences). It should typically not have HTML as it is used in metadata, feeds, SERP and social.

field.name: credit
field.description: A credit is a short string used to publicly acknowledge the source/creator of the video. e.g. "Fox News", "CNN".

field.name: swipe
field.description: A swipe (aka banner/label/overlay) is a short string used in a visual treatment on the video. e.g. "Exclusive", "NSFW", "Breaking Bad Mojo".

field.name: caption_urls
field.description: URL to the caption file keyed by the language code, e.g. "en", "fr".

field.name: mezzanine_url
field.description: URL to the mezzanine video asset.

field.name: mezzanine_ref
field.description: A reference to the mezzanine asset in DAM for this video.

field.name: mpm
field.description: A tracking code for video clips that is used to correlate various metrics with payouts to talent in the clip.
